intro:
SPTAGE Lab is directed by Prof. Weizhi Meng from Lancaster University, focusing on cutting edge research on Security, Privacy and Trust in Communication and Information Systems.

To address advanced practical security challenges, we aim to leverage various techniques such as artificial intelligence, blockchain, machine learning, protocol analysis, behavior monitoring, applied cryptography, etc. Our current research topics include:

  • Artificial intelligence
  • Blockchain technology
  • Biometric authentication
  • Cyber intelligence techniques
  • Intrusion detection
  • IoT/CPS security
  • Malware detection
  • Risk analysis
  • Smartphone security
  • Trust management
  • Usable security and privacy
